verses.verse: כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki If יִגְנֹֽב־ <S%H1589><s%> yig-nov- shall steal אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> 'ish If a man שׁ֣וֹר <S%H7794><s%> Shor an ox אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or שֶׂ֔ה <S%H7716><s%> Seh, or a sheep וּטְבָח֖וֹ <S%H2873><s%> u-te-va-Cho and kill א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or מְכָר֑וֹ <S%H4376><s%> me-cha-Ro; it or sell חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah five בָקָ֗ר <S%H1241><s%> va-Kar, oxen יְשַׁלֵּם֙ <S%H7999><s%> ye-shal-Lem it he shall restore תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat Thahash הַשּׁ֔וֹר <S%H7794><s%> hash-Shor, for an ox וְאַרְבַּע־ <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba'- and four צֹ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> tzon sheep תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat Thahash הַשֶּֽׂה׃ <S%H7716><s%> has-Seh. for a sheep

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If בַּמַּחְתֶּ֛רֶת <S%H4290><s%> bam-mach-Te-ret breaking up יִמָּצֵ֥א <S%H4672><s%> yim-ma-Tze be found הַגַּנָּ֖ב <S%H1590><s%> hag-gan-Nav If a thief וְהֻכָּ֣ה <S%H5221><s%> ve-huk-Kah and be smitten וָמֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> va-Met; that he die אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein there ל֖וֹ lo דָּמִֽים׃ <S%H1818><s%> da-Mim. [there shall] no blood

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if זָרְחָ֥ה <S%H2224><s%> za-re-Chah be risen הַשֶּׁ֛מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> hash-She-mesh If the sun עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav on דָּמִ֣ים <S%H1818><s%> da-Mim upon him [there shall be] blood ל֑וֹ lo; שַׁלֵּ֣ם <S%H7999><s%> shal-Lem [shed] for him [for] he should make full יְשַׁלֵּ֔ם <S%H7999><s%> ye-shal-Lem, restitution אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein nothing ל֔וֹ lo, וְנִמְכַּ֖ר <S%H4376><s%> ve-nim-Kar if he have nothing then he shall be sold בִּגְנֵבָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1591><s%> big-ne-va-To. for his theft

אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If הִמָּצֵא֩ <S%H4672><s%> him-ma-Tze be certainly תִמָּצֵ֨א <S%H4672><s%> tim-ma-Tze found בְיָד֜וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ve-ya-Do in his hand הַגְּנֵבָ֗ה <S%H1591><s%> hag-ge-ne-Vah, If the theft מִשּׁ֧וֹר <S%H7794><s%> mish-Shor whether it be ox עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- or חֲמ֛וֹר <S%H2543><s%> cha-Mor or ass עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- or שֶׂ֖ה <S%H7716><s%> seh or sheep חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yim; alive שְׁנַ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim double יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <S%H7999><s%> ye-shal-Lem. he shall restore ס sa-Mek

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki If יַבְעֶר־ <S%H1197><s%> yav-'er- to be eaten אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> 'ish If a man שָׂדֶ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> sa-Deh shall cause a field אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or כֶ֔רֶם <S%H3754><s%> Che-rem, or vineyard וְשִׁלַּח֙ <S%H7971><s%> ve-shil-Lach and shall put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ; בְּעִירָה be-'i-rah כבְּעִירֹ֔ו <S%H1165><s%> be-'i-Ro, beast קוּבִעֵ֖ר <S%H1197><s%> u-vi-'Er and shall feed בִּשְׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> bis-Deh field אַחֵ֑ר <S%H312><s%> 'a-Cher; in another man's מֵיטַ֥ב <S%H4315><s%> mei-Tav of the best שָׂדֵ֛הוּ <S%H7704><s%> sa-De-hu of his own field וּמֵיטַ֥ב <S%H4315><s%> u-mei-Tav and of the best כַּרְמ֖וֹ <S%H3754><s%> kar-Mo of his own vineyard יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <S%H7999><s%> ye-shal-Lem. shall he make restitution ס sa-Mek

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- If תֵצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> te-Tze break out אֵ֜שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh If fire וּמָצְאָ֤ה <S%H4672><s%> u-ma-tze-'Ah and catch קֹצִים֙ <S%H6975><s%> ko-Tzim in thorns וְנֶאֱכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> ve-ne-'e-Chal be consumed גָּדִ֔ישׁ <S%H1430><s%> ga-Dish, so that the stacks of corn א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or הַקָּמָ֖ה <S%H7054><s%> hak-ka-Mah or the standing corn א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh; or the field שַׁלֵּ֣ם <S%H7999><s%> shal-Lem shall surely יְשַׁלֵּ֔ם <S%H7999><s%> ye-shal-Lem, make restitution הַמַּבְעִ֖ר <S%H1197><s%> ham-mav-'Ir [therewith] he that kindled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבְּעֵרָֽה׃ <S%H1200><s%> hab-be-'e-Rah. the fire ס sa-Mek

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- If יִתֵּן֩ <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten shall deliver אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish If a man אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about רֵעֵ֜הוּ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu unto his neighbour כֶּ֤סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef money אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or כֵלִים֙ <S%H3627><s%> che-Lim or stuff לִשְׁמֹ֔ר <S%H8104><s%> lish-Mor, to keep וְגֻנַּ֖ב <S%H1589><s%> ve-gun-Nav and it be stolen מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> mib-Beit house הָאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish; out of the man's אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if יִמָּצֵ֥א <S%H4672><s%> yim-ma-Tze be found הַגַּנָּ֖ב <S%H1590><s%> hag-gan-Nav if the thief יְשַׁלֵּ֥ם <S%H7999><s%> ye-shal-Lem let him pay שְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim. double

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo be not יִמָּצֵא֙ <S%H4672><s%> yim-ma-Tze found הַגַּנָּ֔ב <S%H1590><s%> hag-gan-Nav, If the thief וְנִקְרַ֥ב <S%H7126><s%> ve-nik-Rav shall be brought בַּֽעַל־ <S%H1167><s%> ba-'al- then the master הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit of the house אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- before הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; unto the judges אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not שָׁלַ֛ח <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach [to see] whether he have put יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do his hand בִּמְלֶ֥אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> bim-Le-chet goods רֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu. unto his neighbour's

עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- For כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- For all manner פֶּ֡שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> Pe-sha' of trespass עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- for שׁ֡וֹר <S%H7794><s%> Shor [whether it be] for ox עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- for חֲ֠מוֹר <S%H2543><s%> Cha-mor for ass עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- for שֶׂ֨ה <S%H7716><s%> seh for sheep עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- for שַׂלְמָ֜ה <S%H8008><s%> sal-Mah for raiment עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- for כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any אֲבֵדָ֗ה <S%H9><s%> 'a-ve-Dah, [or] for any manner of lost thing אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יֹאמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> yo-Mar which [another] challengeth כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he זֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> Zeh, This עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad before הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, before the judges יָבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo shall come דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- to be his the cause שְׁנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H8147><s%> she-nei-Hem; of both parties אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom יַרְשִׁיעֻן֙ <S%H7561><s%> yar-shi-'Un shall condemn אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, [and] whom the judges יְשַׁלֵּ֥ם <S%H7999><s%> ye-shal-Lem he shall pay שְׁנַ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim double לְרֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7453><s%> le-re-'E-hu. unto his neighbour ס sa-Mek

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- If יִתֵּן֩ <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten deliver אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish If a man אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about רֵעֵ֜הוּ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu unto his neighbour חֲמ֨וֹר <S%H2543><s%> cha-Mor an ass אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or שׁ֥וֹר <S%H7794><s%> Shor or an ox אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or שֶׂ֛ה <S%H7716><s%> seh or a sheep וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol any בְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> be-he-Mah or any beast לִשְׁמֹ֑ר <S%H8104><s%> lish-Mor; to keep וּמֵ֛ת <S%H4191><s%> u-Met and it die אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or נִשְׁבַּ֥ר <S%H7665><s%> nish-Bar or be hurt אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or נִשְׁבָּ֖ה <S%H7617><s%> nish-Bah or driven away אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein no רֹאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> ro-'Eh. no man seeing

שְׁבֻעַ֣ת <S%H7621><s%> she-vu-'At [Then] shall an oath יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD תִּהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh shall be made בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> bein by שְׁנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H8147><s%> she-nei-Hem, be between them both אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo has not שָׁלַ֛ח <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach that he hath not put יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do his hand בִּמְלֶ֣אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> bim-Le-chet goods רֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu; unto his neighbour's וְלָקַ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-Kach of it shall accept בְּעָלָ֖יו <S%H1167><s%> be-'a-Lav and the owner וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo shall not יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <S%H7999><s%> ye-shal-Lem. [thereof] and he shall not make [it] good

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if גָּנֹ֥ב <S%H1589><s%> ga-No is actually יִגָּנֵ֖ב <S%H1589><s%> yig-ga-Nev stolen מֵעִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> me-'im-Mo; with יְשַׁלֵּ֖ם <S%H7999><s%> ye-shal-Lem from him he shall make restitution לִבְעָלָֽיו׃ <S%H1167><s%> liv-'a-Lav. unto the owner

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If טָרֹ֥ף <S%H2963><s%> ta-Rof torn יִטָּרֵ֖ף <S%H2963><s%> yit-ta-Ref to pieces יְבִאֵ֣הוּ <S%H935><s%> ye-vi-'E-hu [then] let him bring עֵ֑ד <S%H5707><s%> 'Ed; it [for] witness הַטְּרֵפָ֖ה <S%H2966><s%> hat-te-re-Fah that which was torn לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <S%H7999><s%> ye-shal-Lem. [and] he shall not make good פ Peh

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ve-chi- If יִשְׁאַ֥ל <S%H7592><s%> yish-'Al borrow אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish And if a man מֵעִ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> me-'Im thereof [being] not with it רֵעֵ֖הוּ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu [ought] of his neighbour וְנִשְׁבַּ֣ר <S%H7665><s%> ve-nish-Bar and it be hurt אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or מֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> Met; or die בְּעָלָ֥יו <S%H1167><s%> be-'a-Lav the owner אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- else עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo with שַׁלֵּ֥ם <S%H7999><s%> shal-Lem he shall surely יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <S%H7999><s%> ye-shal-Lem. make [it] good

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If בְּעָלָ֥יו <S%H1167><s%> be-'a-Lav [But] if the owner עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo with לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not יְשַׁלֵּ֑ם <S%H7999><s%> ye-shal-Lem; thereof [be] with it he shall not make [it] good אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if שָׂכִ֣יר <S%H7916><s%> sa-Chir if it [be] an hired ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, it בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> ba [thing] it came בִּשְׂכָרֽוֹ׃ <S%H7939><s%> bis-cha-Ro. for his hire ס sa-Mek

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ve-chi- If יְפַתֶּ֣ה <S%H6601><s%> ye-fat-Teh entice אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, And if a man בְּתוּלָ֛ה <S%H1330><s%> be-tu-Lah a maid אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- is not אֹרָ֖שָׂה <S%H781><s%> 'o-Ra-sah that is not betrothed וְשָׁכַ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> ve-sha-Chav and lie עִמָּ֑הּ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mah; must מָהֹ֛ר <S%H4117><s%> ma-Hor with her he shall surely יִמְהָרֶ֥נָּה <S%H4117><s%> yim-ha-Ren-nah endow לּ֖וֹ lo לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-Shah. her to be his wife

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If מָאֵ֧ן <S%H3985><s%> ma-'En utterly יְמָאֵ֛ן <S%H3985><s%> ye-ma-'En refuse אָבִ֖יהָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-ha If her father לְתִתָּ֣הּ <S%H5414><s%> le-tit-Tah to give ל֑וֹ lo; כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef money יִשְׁקֹ֔ל <S%H8254><s%> yish-Kol, her unto him he shall pay כְּמֹ֖הַר <S%H4119><s%> ke-Mo-har according to the dowry הַבְּתוּלֹֽת׃ <S%H1330><s%> hab-be-tu-Lot. of virgins ס sa-Mek
מְכַשֵּׁפָ֖ה <S%H3784><s%> me-chash-she-Fah Thou shalt not suffer a witch לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תְחַיֶּֽה׃ <S%H2421><s%> te-chai-Yeh. to live ס sa-Mek

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- Whoever שֹׁכֵ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> sho-Chev Whosoever lieth עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with בְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> be-he-Mah with a beast מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat. be put to death ס sa-Mek

זֹבֵ֥חַ <S%H2076><s%> zo-Ve-ach He that sacrificeth לָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> la-'E-lo-Him unto [any] god יָֽחֳרָ֑ם <S%H2763><s%> yo-cho-Ram; only he shall be utterly destroyed בִּלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> bil-Ti save לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD לְבַדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H905><s%> le-vad-Do. alone
